      • addUser

        public static void addUser(DAO sql,
                           boolean visibilityViolation,
                           java.util.List<AbstractBean> listResources,
                           java.util.List<UserBean> listUserBean,
                           EntitlementBean entitlementBean)
                    throws java.lang.Exception
        The method assigns the administrative entitlement given to each of the users given immediately after it is assigned to the organizational unit to which each user belongs. The visibilityViolation boolean flag is used to specify if the administrative entitlement, in case it is not already assigned to the i-th organization unit, must be assigned to the i-th organization unit in visibility violation or not. It is also possible to contextually assign a list of resources to each of the n entitlement-user couples created.
        Parameters:
        sql - mandatory connection parameter
        visibilityViolation - boolean flag used to specify if the administrative entitlement can be assigned in visibility violation or not
        listResources - list of resources to assign to each of the n entitlement-user couples created. If used, the elements must be defined uniquely
        listUserBean - list of users target of the assignment, mandatory
        entitlementBean - entitlement to assign, mandatory and defined uniquely
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
